Comments_List: I continued to learn about the interactions of matter when combined together or manipulated by artificial conditions. I developed my ability to conduct scientific experiments and report my findings.
I developed skills crucial for laboratory procedures in chem labs.
I was able to master skills such as titrations and spectrometry.
The strength of the course is the ability to fit multiple topics into one experiment. The weakness is the pace and the lack of consistency with material tested on.
Timing was rigorous but it was well planned and efficient.
Only if they needed to get this course done outside of the school year.
Yes. It was thorough and well executed
